subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Stacy Lewis, the first United States-born winner of the L.P.G.A. Player of the Year award since 1994, will get to take golf’s version of a victory lap at the Titleholders tournament in Naples, Fla.
snippet: Stacy Lewis, the first United States-born winner of the L.P.G.A. Player of the Year award since 1994, will get to take golf’s version of a victory lap at the Titleholders tournament in Naples, Fla.
